messages.message: we still don't know why the org admin doesn't have permissions to get the deployment queues on aihub-uat, right?
Yea... I was trying to debug this locally but got some local set up issues. I can take a closer look again today

```2025/05/22 19:23:55 DEBUG coreplatformservice/repo/handler/doc_management.go:2213 -- trace_id="00000000000000000000000000000000" PopulateDocs {"app_id":"34a4203c-3094-4637-95e3-673e7dfa360d","context":{"username":"aihub_marketplace_admin"},"file_records":[{"ibocr_records":[{"blocked":0,"failure":1,"name":"4a21f8ce276610e5c3ec0ca346c5ddb0.png","path":"xindixu-v1-org/ws1/fs/Instabase Drive/app-runs/34a4203c-3094-4637-95e3-673e7dfa360d/1747941805184/output/s4_apply_checkpoint/4a21f8ce276610e5c3ec0ca346c5ddb0.png.ibmsg","record_index":0,"step_id":"s4","warning":0}],"path":"xindixu-v1-org/ws1/fs/Instabase Drive/app-runs/34a4203c-3094-4637-95e3-673e7dfa360d/1747941805184/output/s4_apply_checkpoint/4a21f8ce276610e5c3ec0ca346c5ddb0.png.ibmsg","step_id":"s4"}],"is_ground_truth_set":false,"job_id":"b54dfa7b-36d2-4126-9a13-d992ca3d1d73"}```
Sharing the request to `PopulateDocs` . Didn't realize that the username is `aihub_marketplace_admin`, not the requestor....

Another error
```2025/05/22 19:23:55 ERROR coreplatformservice/repo/handler/doc_management.go:2339 -- [INTERNAL]: Could not generate queue metadata (Err: No reviewers found to assign documents to)```
So `aihub_marketplace_admin` in crafting-cyp, where test passed, is a site admin; in aihub-uat, where test failed, is not a site admin...
Deployment passed after promoting `aihub_marketplace_admin` to a site admin.
I've set `aihub_marketplace_admin` in aihub-sandbox and uat to a site admin. Since deployment passed after promoting `aihub_marketplace_admin` to a site admin, we can close out this thread now.
Maybe... we should disallow demoting these accounts to non-admins

thank you for debugging this!!

yes i forgot `aihub_marketplace_admin` is used here, but this all makes sense now :raised_hands:

the action item of showing a warning for demoting system users also would be great!

Np! I should have looked closer at the python code that calls `PopulateDocs`  ... it was pretty clear :sweat_smile:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/ab1251a65e7dad17c0ec64f8bc2e2c7cb74a12[â€¦]tils/flow-export/src/py/instabase/flow_export/export_results.py (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/ab1251a65e7dad17c0ec64f8bc2e2c7cb74a1212/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-export/src/py/instabase/flow_export/export_results.py#L1919-L1938)
well all 3 of us missed it :patrick-shrug:
